definition: (dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Everyday the boy would hunt and everyday the grandmother would bring corn to add to the pot.
sentences.chinese: 孫子每天出去打獵，奶奶每天取出一些包穀放到鍋裏。
